goal.en: Developing students‘ proficiency in programming languages and automation control techniques for their application in research-based experiments related to fundamental physics.
goal.ch: 培養學生使用程式語言與自動化控制等技術，在基礎物理相關的研究專題實驗上的運用。

content.en: Integrate the knowledge acquired in the first semester, including programming language (Python), automation control (Arduino, LabView), image analysis (Tracker, Python), electronic circuits, and other technologies, to conduct 1-2 special projects.
content.ch: 綜合第一學期所學會的：1. 程式語言(Python)，自動化控制(Arduino、LabView)，影像分析(Tracker、Python)，電子電路等技術進行1-2項專題研究。

textbook.en: Lecture notes, journal papers, or online reference materials based on the content of each unit
textbook.ch: 依各單元內容，自編講義、期刊論文或是網路參考文獻

method.en: Lecture Seminar Practical Training Lab Individual Instruction
method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗 個別指導

grading.en: Weekly reports (35％) + oral presentations (15％) + class performance (35％) + final report and presentation (15％)
grading.ch: 每週書面報告(35％) + 口頭報告(15％) + 課堂表現(35％) + 期末書面與報告(15％)

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance ， Portfolios Assessment ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment
